name: Dutch Lake Motel and Campground

reviews.text: An okay motel, a little difficult for us to judge as it was part of an organised tour, but it seemed a mean sort of place, nothing was included and everything in the room was in a locked cupboard. Room mixup as well. However the view from the balcony made up for it.
reviews.title: Breathtaking view
Recommended
reviews.text: Four of us stayed for one night here last month stopping off for a day in Wells Gray Provincial Park while heading from Vancouver to Jasper. It's a nice, clean, well maintained and friendly motel set back from the highway.

aka: Dutch Lake Motel And Campground Hotel Clearwater
